title: $100M Offers
author: Alex Hormozi
summary: Framework for creating irresistible offers by stacking value, reducing risk, and positioning uniquely. Core idea: Make your offer so good people feel stupid saying no.
keyInsights: Grand Slam Offer = High value + Low friction + Low risk
Stack value: bonuses, guarantees, scarcity, urgency
Charge premium prices for premium transformation
implementation: Applied to Studio Shade Co pricing. Rebuilt offer with: 30-day guarantee, free design consultation, 10-year warranty. Increased close rate from 18% to 34%.
quotes: The goal is not to beat your competitors' price, but to make it irrelevant.
People buy on emotion and justify with logic.

title: The Lean Startup
author: Eric Ries
summary: Build-Measure-Learn feedback loop. Validated learning through rapid experimentation. MVP concept.
keyInsights: Build MVPs to test assumptions quickly
Pivot or persevere based on data, not gut
implementation: Started running weekly experiments for Studio Shade Co. Last week: tested SMS follow-ups (28% response rate vs 12% email).
quotes: The only way to win is to learn faster than anyone else.
